description: This rich chocolate and orange rice pudding is a decadent dessert that can be ready in less than an hour.
keywords: Rice pudding,Seafood free,Wheat free,Rice,Egg free,Chocolate,Sesame free
name: Chocolate Orange Rice Pudding Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.6 cup cream, save 1 tbs whipped to soft peaks

recipeInstructions.text: Add the milk, chocolate and orange zest to a heavy bottomed saucepan and cook for 2-3 minutes, until the chocolate has melted. Stir in the rice.
Pre-heat the oven to 160Â°C. Tip the rice mix into a large ovenproof dish and bake for 45 minutes, stirring every so often, until tender and creamy. Serve topped with a dollop of whipped cream.
